extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Baseline characteristics of the group that converted to Alzheimer's disease (MCIc) and the group that did not convert to Alzheimer's disease (MCInc) at a two-year follow-up. Values are mean (SD). All neuropsychological test scores are raw values. Group comparisons by *t-test and †Fisher exact test, two-tailed. MCI, Mild Cognitive impairment; MCIc, MCI group converted to Alzheimer's disease; MCInc, MCI group not converted to Alzheimer's disease; BDS-ADL, Blessed Dementia Scale-Activities of Daily living.

fn.p: Baseline characteristics of the group that converted to Alzheimer's disease (MCIc) and the group that did not convert to Alzheimer's disease (MCInc) at a two-year follow-up. Values are mean (SD). All neuropsychological test scores are raw values. Group comparisons by *t-test and †Fisher exact test, two-tailed. MCI, Mild Cognitive impairment; MCIc, MCI group converted to Alzheimer's disease; MCInc, MCI group not converted to Alzheimer's disease; BDS-ADL, Blessed Dementia Scale-Activities of Daily living.
